reviewText:
Another in a series of three instructional DVDs that goes the extra distance with not only easy to follow instructions on basic belly dance moves and a short routine incorporating the movements taught but also includes a exciting workout designed for the belly dancer that can be used alone or in conjunction with the instructional part.

In addition, two performances in costume, one by Paulina and another one by Aleya finish off the DVD.  As always IAMED gives the viewer more for their money making it a wise investment.
